about_the_game:
A collaboration DLC project between "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" and Vtuber "Amane Momo"!

  • Vtuber "Amane Momo" appears in the world of "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" as a cute pixel art character!
  • Vtuber "Amane Momo" will be added to the town of Portamare as a new resident character.
  • Fans will also have a special line that is only available here!
  • A special residence supervised by her is also available. You can only build one in the town.
  • She also appear as allied merchants in business negotiation battles. You may be able to advance your business negotiations to an advantage.

*Prices have been set in accordance with the activity policy after consultation with the distributor!

  • She also appear as allied merchants in business negotiation battles. You may be able to advance your business negotiations to an advantage.

*Prices have been set in accordance with the activity policy after consultation with the distributor!
